projects.name: OceanDAO
projects.tagline: Decentralized ocean DNA sequencing and marine research
projects.description: OceanDAO is accelerating breakthrough research in ocean genomics through decentralized funding and open collaboration. Our community of marine biologists, oceanographers, and environmental scientists is working to sequence and understand marine DNA to protect ocean biodiversity, discover new species, and develop sustainable marine biotechnology.
projects.longDescription: By democratizing access to ocean research data and creating new funding mechanisms for marine exploration, we're building a future where ocean conservation is driven by scientific understanding and community action.

milestones.title: DAO Infrastructure & Community Building
milestones.description: Launch governance token, establish DAO structure, recruit initial research team, build community of 1000+ members

milestones.title: Ocean DNA Database Launch
milestones.description: Deploy sequencing infrastructure, standardize analysis pipelines, onboard first 10,000 samples, launch researcher portal

milestones.title: Decentralized Research Network
milestones.description: Fund first 5 research expeditions, establish marine lab partnerships, launch citizen scientist program with 5,000+ participants

projects.name: NeuroDAO
projects.tagline: Decentralized brain research and neurological therapeutics
projects.description: NeuroDAO is revolutionizing neuroscience research through decentralized funding and open collaboration for brain health solutions.

projects.name: LongevityDAO
projects.tagline: Extending healthy human lifespan through decentralized research
projects.description: LongevityDAO funds breakthrough research in aging, regenerative medicine, and life extension technologies.

projects.name: ClimateDAO
projects.tagline: Decentralized climate solutions and carbon removal
projects.description: ClimateDAO accelerates climate tech innovation through community-driven funding of carbon removal and sustainable technologies.

projects.name: QuantumDAO
projects.description: QuantumDAO funds open-source quantum computing research and makes quantum technologies accessible to everyone.

projects.name: FusionDAO
projects.description: FusionDAO brings together researchers and engineers to solve fusion energy challenges through decentralized collaboration.

projects.name: SpaceDAO
projects.description: SpaceDAO funds open-source space technologies, satellite missions, and makes space accessible to all humanity.

projects.name: AI Safety DAO
projects.tagline: Ensuring beneficial AI through decentralized research
projects.description: AI Safety DAO funds critical research in AI alignment, safety, and beneficial artificial general intelligence.
